dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 4072 IH: To remove a restriction that prohibits the use of Federal funds to pay for maintenance of the memorial to honor Tomas G. Masaryk in the District of Columbia.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Schakowsky (for herself, Mrs. Dingell, and Mr. Barton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To remove a restriction that prohibits the use of Federal funds to pay for maintenance of the memorial to honor Tomas G. Masaryk in the District of Columbia.

section.header: Restriction on use of Federal funds removed
section.text: Section 1(c) of Public Law 107â€“61 is amended by striking or its maintenance.
